statement: Write a program that prints every even integer between 2 and 100 inclusive. Every integer should be in its own line and there should be an empty line in the end.
Write a program that prints the english alphabet. Eg: 'abc...'
Write a program that prints every prime number between 2 and 1000. Print one integer per line.
Write a program that takes a string and reverses it three times.
Write a program that takes a sequence of numbers separated by spaces and prints the longest contiguous subsequence of even numbers.

Write a program that takes a set of two or more points (each point a pair of integer coordinates x and y) one per line (terminanting with the point 0 0) and returns the index (given by the order of input) of the point which is furthest away from the first one.
Write a program that takes a positive integer and prints its factorial modulus 100000
